meanings.definition: Second person singular present form of go.
meanings.sent3: The cat goest on a grand adventure.
meanings.sent4: Her dreams goest beyond the stars.

meanings.definition: Used to indicate motion or direction.
meanings.sent1: The car goest down the road.
meanings.sent2: The river goest towards the ocean.
meanings.sent3: The arrow goest straight to the target.
meanings.sent4: Her gaze goest beyond the horizon.
meanings.sent5: The path goest through the forest.

meanings.sent1: She goest slowly up the stairs.
meanings.sent2: The train goest along the tracks.
meanings.sent3: The turtle goest at its own pace.
meanings.sent5: The sun goest down in the evening.
